channel.title: Darkthrone recruiter
channel.description:
Well, when I used to play DT a lot, the only good recruiter I knew of was [url=http://www.videogames.ro/bt2/bbb.htm]this[/url], but the problem was it was a fixed rows/columns recruiter. A friend mentioned DT a few days ago so I started googling for another recruiter(to use with SCAR, of course) and I really didn't find any as good as [url=http://www.videogames.ro/bt2/bbb.htm]this[/url], but my screen resolution is 1680x1050, there's no way I could recruit 350 times in a nice amount of time on a 5x4 recruiter, so, I downloaded the source, cleaned it up a bit, added some php and what do you know, just 12kb in 3 files and I've made a nice recruiter with unlimited rows/columns.
[url=http://niallite.com/dt/index.php]You can find it here[/url].
To do: Store cookies of what the user puts in the rows/columns box, allow users to choose what size the frames are/what they scroll to.

item.title: Darkthrone recruiter
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Well, when I used to play DT a lot, the only good recruiter I knew of was this, but the problem was it was a fixed rows/columns recruiter. A friend mentioned DT a few days ago so I started googling for another recruiter(to use with SCAR, of course) and I really didn’t find any as good as this, but my screen resolution is 1680x1050, there’s no way I could recruit 350 times in a nice amount of time on a 5x4 recruiter, so, I downloaded the source, cleaned it up a bit, added some php and what do you know, just 12kb in 3 files and I’ve made a nice recruiter with unlimited rows/columns.
